DOC.brief_summary: The aim project investigate potential benefit combine new protein meat hydrolysate extract regular endurance training programme ( ) body composition ( b ) performance ( c ) muscle structure ( ) immunology ( e ) microbiota ( f ) haematological marker endurance athlete
DOC.brief_title: Meat Whey Protein Supplementation Endurance Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: PROYECT DESIGN This investigation involve 10-week randomise , balance , double blind parallel group between-subjects design , aim analyse effect combine endurance exercise post exercise nutrition strategy ( hydrolysates meat protein ( MEAT ) + whey protein ( W ) isocaloric carbohydrate placebo ) training outcome , immunity haematological variable regular train feed intervention . Participants divide two-treatment group 1 ) Hydrolysed meat-protein + whey ( PROT ) ; 2 ) non-protein iso-energetic placebo ( CHO ) . Once consider eligible study , initial familiarisation period plus baseline test ( endurance performance body composition blood extraction ) participant randomly assign one intervention group : PROT CHO . Each group follow 10-week periodised endurance training intervention combine one two specific supplementation treatment ( PROT CHO ) . Measurements performance ( VO2peak , vetilatory threshold time exhaustion maximal aerobic intensity ) , body composition ( fat fat free mass ) , microbiota haematology determine 10-week intervention period . Once informed consent health history obtain , baseline assessment ( t1 ) , participant divide two similar profile group , match body mass , age , sex maximal oxygen uptake ( VO2peak ) : ( 1 ) PROT ( 2 ) CHO INTERVENTION The intervention comprise 10-week combine supplementation ( MEAT + W CHO ) regular endurance-training programme . Endurance training Participants commit follow polarise triphasic endurance-training model . This model contain three intensity zone calculate low intensity [ < first ventilatory threshold ( VT1 ) , ~ 70 % HRmax ] ; moderate intensity [ VT1 respiratory compensation point ventilatory threshold 2 ( VT2 ) , > 70 < 90 % HRmax ] ; high intensity [ > VT2 , 90 % HRmax ] . Participants train 5 6 time per week total percentage distribution 75 80 % low intensity ; 10 % moderate intensity , 15 10 % high intensity . Cardiorespiratory test Participants perform maximal cardiorespiratory exercise test training period determine peak oxygen uptake ( VO2peak ) ventilatory threshold . Percentage HRmax 15 point ( 6 20 ) Borg Scale Rate Perceive Exertion ( RPE ) use appropriately select load along train intervention . Supplementation protocol Training day : Immediately ( < 10 min ) complete train session , participant consume beverage contain 20g supplement ( 10g MEAT + 10g W ) plus 200 ml orange juice carbohydrate placebo ( maltodextrine orange juice ) . Non-training day : breakfast . Supplements placebo provide powder form mix 200ml orange juice water moment consumption . The supplement placebo look taste identical . Thus total one 20g dos administer daily base . Participants require ingest total 70 total 10 week study intervention . Supplements provide 14 day interval distribute blind researcher participant return empty bag supplement/placebo consume previous 14 day period .
DOC.criteria: 18 year 45 Vo2max > 50ml/kg/min Regularly trained athlete , Minimum 3 year experience resistance train exercise , Volunteers , musculoskeletal injury , metabolic condition , disease ; use medication , smoking , nutritional supplement know affect physical performance , muscle damage recovery process ( e.g. , creatine , whey protein , amino acid ) within 6 week prior start study .
